title: Zero-Day Initiative (ZDI) Advisories
description: Latest unreported zero-day vulnerabilities with exploitation details.

title: CISA Known Exploited Vulnerabilities Catalog
description: Daily-updated list of vulnerabilities actively exploited in attacks (U.S. government source).

title: Krebs on Security
description: In-depth investigations of major hacker operations (e.g., ransomware campaigns, APTs).

title: The Hacker News - Exploits Section
description: Dedicated feed for newly discovered exploits and attack methods.

title: Dark Reading - Attack & Breaches
description: Breaking news on enterprise breaches and attack vectors.

title: BleepingComputer - Malware News
description: Real-time tracking of new malware strains and cybercriminal tactics.

title: Recorded Future - Threat Intelligence
description: Actionable intelligence on emerging threats and hacker groups.

title: Exploit-DB Recent Entries
description: Freshly added exploits with PoC code (curated by Offensive Security).

title: APT Groups & Operations (MITRE)
description: Tracking advanced persistent threat actors and their TTPs.

title: Twitter #0day
description: Real-time zero-day discussions from researchers (always verify claims).

title: VX-Underground
description: Archive of malware source code, leaks, and hacker manuals.

title: Ransomware.live
description: Live tracker of ransomware attacks worldwide with victim data.

title: Threatpost - Zero-Day Reports
description: Verified zero-day disclosures and impact analysis.

title: MalwareTech Botnet Tracker
description: Live monitoring of botnet C&C servers and takedowns.

title: PhishTank
description: Community-driven phishing site database (by OpenDNS).

title: GreyNoise - Zero-Day Tracking
description: Detects exploitation attempts for unpatched vulnerabilities.

title: CyberWire Daily Podcast
description: Daily briefings on major cyber incidents and threats.

title: Have I Been Pwned?
description: Check if your data appeared in recent breaches.

title: DeHashed
description: Aggregator of leaked credentials from recent hacks.

title: Intel471 Adversary Intelligence
description: Underground monitoring of hacker forums and dark web markets.

title: Cyber Threat Coalition
description: Real-time threat indicators from security community collaborations.

title: AlienVault Open Threat Exchange
description: Crowdsourced platform for sharing security threats and indicators.

title: Malpedia
description: Repository of malware samples and behavior analysis.

title: URLhaus
description: Live database of malicious URLs for threat detection.

title: ThreatMiner
description: Platform for threat intelligence data aggregation and analysis.

title: Censys.io
description: Search engine for internet-connected devices and vulnerabilities.

title: Shodan
description: Discover exposed devices and vulnerable systems worldwide.

title: BinaryEdge
description: Real-time threat intelligence on exposed internet assets.

title: MISP Threat Sharing
description: Open source threat intelligence platform for sharing indicators.

title: Talon Cyber Threat Feed
description: Curated feed of emerging cyber threats and IOCs.

title: VirusBay
description: Collaborative malware analysis platform with community sharing.

title: CyberGreen
description: Global initiative to reduce systemic cyber risks and vulnerabilities.

title: ThreatButt
description: Satirical but sometimes useful threat intelligence source.

title: APT Notes
description: Collection of public documents about APT groups and operations.

title: Ransomware Tracker
description: Tracking ransomware operators and their infrastructure.

title: Botnet Tracker by Abuse.ch
description: Monitoring active botnets and their command servers.
